name: Retrieve all books as a logged-in user

testSteps.description: 1: Retrieve all books as a logged-in user ({user_role=admin})

children.description: Given I am a admin user
When I send a GET request to retrieve the book list

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=9A8F40697D05630307258720F94548CD; Path=/; HttpOnly
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Tue, 07 Jan 2025 04:55:05 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: Then the response status code should be 200
And the response should contain a list of books

title: Retrieve all books as a logged-in user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am a <user_role> user
When I send a GET request to retrieve the book list
Then the response status code should be 200
And the response should contain a list of books
